author: will.iginin
content:
The Pectra upgrade includes EIP-7702 which introduces a new transaction type: 0x04. Can anyone give me an example of such a transaction? I cannot find one on the mekong testnet explorer.
EIP-7702: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-7702.md#set-code-transaction
Mekong testnet explorer: https://explorer.mekong.ethpandaops.io/txs

Besides, how do I construct such a transaction myself?

author: parithosh
content: You can follow the guide here to use viem to send a 0x04 transaction: https://viem.sh/experimental/eip7702/sending-transactions
